p: All residual chemicals were of analytical grade. Hydrocortisone, bovine albumin serum, diclofenac sodium, diazepam and thiopental-Na were purchased from Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd. (Dhaka, Bangladesh), loperamide was collected from Beacon Pharmaceuticals (Dhaka, Bangladesh). The other chemicals like phosphate buffer, acetic acid and formalin were brought from local sources.
